name: Poopy.life header removal
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Poopy.life offers a free temporary WordPress testing site. It's amazing, and one of the best ways to get started on learning how to use WordPress. But, they have a large persistent header, and an extension nag, that interrupt the normal view of editing a WordPress site. Enjoy poopy.life free of distractions!
